news_items.headline: AMD revenue forecast disappoints on weak console demand
news_items.lede: Advanced Micro Devices Inc's <AMD.O> first-quarter revenue estimate came in largely below analysts' estimates due to waning demand from gaming console makers, even as its data center and PC chips business tracked a recovery in the chip industry.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: Lisa Su, president and CEO of AMD, gives a keynote address during the 2019 CES in Las Vegas, Nevada, U.S., January 9, 2019. REUTERS/Steve Marcus

news_items.headline: AMD forecasts current-quarter revenue below estimates
news_items.lede: Advanced Micro Devices Inc forecast current-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, due to waning demand from console makers such as Sony and Microsoft ahead of new launches.

news_items.headline: Intel's blockbuster results lift shares to dotcom peak, fire up sector
news_items.lede: Intel Corp's <INTC.O> shares hit their highest in nearly two decades on Friday after cloud computing demand fired up the chipmaker's data center business and allayed concerns of market share loss to rival AMD, lifting stocks across the sector.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: Computer chip maker Intel's logo is shown on a gaming computer display during the opening day of E3, the annual video games expo revealing the latest in gaming software and hardware in Los Angeles, California, U.S., June 11, 2019.  REUTERS/Mike Blake

news_items.headline: Intel's cloud growth lifts shares, fires up other chipmakers
news_items.lede: Intel Corp's shares rose 5% on Friday after demand from data centres fired up the chipmaker's cloud business and allayed concerns of market share loss to rival AMD, lifting shares across the sector.

news_items.headline: Amazon designs more powerful data center chip
news_items.lede: (This December 3 story has been refiled to correct typo in paragraph 2)
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: Staff chat at the front desk of the Amazon office in the Manhattan borough of New York, New York, U.S., May 1, 2019.   REUTERS/Carlo Allegri

news_items.headline: AMD revenue forecast falls short despite data center strength
news_items.lede: Advanced Micro Devices Inc <AMD.O> fell short of Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue and forecast fourth-quarter sales below expectations on Tuesday, even as the U.S. chipmaker beat targets for its closely watched data center business.

news_items.headline: AMD forecasts current-quarter revenue below estimates
news_items.lede: Advanced Micro Devices Inc forecast current-quarter revenue slightly below Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, as chipmakers struggle with an industry-wide slowdown and the fallout from an ongoing U.S.-China trade war.

news_items.headline: AMD lands Google, Twitter as customers with newest server chip
news_items.lede: Advanced Micro Devices Inc <AMD.O> on Wednesday released the second generation of its processor chip for data centers and said that it had landed Alphabet Inc' <GOOGL.O> Google and Twitter Inc <TWTR.N> as customers.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: Lisa Su, president and CEO of AMD, gives a keynote address during the 2019 CES in Las Vegas, Nevada, U.S., January 9, 2019. REUTERS/Steve Marcus

news_items.headline: AMD lands Google, Twitter as customers with newest server chip
news_items.lede: Advanced Micro Devices Inc on Wednesday released the second generation of its processor chip for data centers and said that it had landed Alphabet Inc' Google and Twitter Inc as customers.

news_items.headline: AMD revenue forecast falls short as gaming console chip demand drops
news_items.lede: Advanced Micro Devices Inc <AMD.O> forecast third-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, hit by lower demand for its chips used in gaming consoles and sending its shares down 4% after the closing bell.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: Lisa Su, president and CEO of AMD, gives a keynote address during the 2019 CES in Las Vegas, Nevada, U.S., January 9, 2019. REUTERS/Steve Marcus

news_items.headline: Chipmaker AMD's third-quarter revenue forecast falls short, shares slip
news_items.lede: U.S. chipmaker Advanced Micro Devices Inc forecast third-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, sending its shares down 6% in after-market trading.

news_items.headline: AMD shares rise on mobile graphics tie-up with Samsung
news_items.lede: Chipmaker Advanced Micro Devices shares rose 7 percent in early trading on Monday after the company announced a deal with Samsung Electronics Co Ltd that could allow it to better compete with Nvidia Corp.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: Lisa Su, president and CEO of AMD, introduces the Radeon VII, a 7nm gaming graphics card during a keynote address at the 2019 CES in Las Vegas, Nevada, U.S., January 9, 2019. REUTERS/Steve Marcus

news_items.headline: Fed Circuit remands patent privateering case to ponder joinder for chipmaker AMD
news_items.lede: A federal appeals court on Thursday revived patent infringement cases a licensing entity brought against chipmakers United Microelectronics Corp and Nanya Technology Corp.

news_items.headline: AMD results beat estimates on data center, server growth; shares climb
news_items.lede: U.S. chipmaker Advanced Micro Devices Inc beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue and profit on Tuesday, selling more chips used in data centers and servers, and sending its shares up 6 percent in after-market trading.

news_items.headline: AMD's quarterly revenue beats estimates on data center growth
news_items.lede: U.S. chipmaker Advanced Micro Devices Inc reported better-than-expected quarterly revenue on Tuesday, helped by growth in its data center business, sending its shares up 6 percent in extended trading.

news_items.headline: AMD subsidiary wins reinstatement of computer graphics patents
news_items.lede: A federal appeals court on Thursday revived three computer graphic patents held by a subsidiary of semiconductor company Advanced Micro Devices Inc that had been largely struck down by a U.S. patent appeals board, finding that the board had wrongly concluded the patents...

news_items.headline: Abu Dhabi's Mubadala sells 34.9 million shares in U.S. chipmaker AMD
news_items.lede: Abu Dhabi's Mubadala Investment Co has sold 34.9 million common equity shares in Advanced Micro Devices (AMD), a company spokesperson said on Tuesday, and plans to convert 75 million warrants in the U.S chipmaker.

news_items.headline: CORRECTED-Mubadala to sell 34.9 mln shares in Advanced Micro Devices
news_items.lede: Mubadala Investment Company announced on Tuesday the sale of its stake of 34.9 million common equity shares, along with a plan to convert 75 million warrants, in US-based semi-conductor company Advanced Micro Devices.

news_items.headline: AMD shares jump on record growth in data center revenue
news_items.lede: Chipmaker Advanced Micro Devices Inc on Tuesday reported record quarterly growth in data center sales and projected revenue growth in fiscal 2019 above Wall Street expectations, sending its shares up 10 percent after the bell.

news_items.headline: AMD reports record data center revenue, shares jump
news_items.lede: Advanced Micro Devices Inc on Tuesday said it saw record growth in data center revenue, in sharp contrast to results by bigger rivals Nvidia Corp and Intel Corp.
